Trade/Device Name(s): VivaChek™ Fad Blood Glucose Monitoring System
VivaChek™ Fad Smart Blood Glucose Monitoring System
VivaChek™ Fad Sync Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VivaChek™ Fad Smart Blood Glucose Meter
VivaChek™ Fad Sync Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VivaChek™ Fad Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems using electrochemical biosensor technology for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose concentration in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for self-testing by persons with diabetes at home to monitor diabetes control; not for neonatal use or for diagnosis/screening of diabetes; single-user, in vitro diagnostic use.
